body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

 spack install repeatmodeler arch=linux-centos7-haswell %gcc@8.2.0

### Information on your system

[root@scyphozoa spack]# spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-1-c699e90
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-haswell


### Additional information

[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7171492/spack-build-out.txt)
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7171493/spack-build-env.txt)


### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: repeatmodeler fails on dependency ncbi-rmblastn
